definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin

sentences.english: You can modify the code presented here to support only key-press events.
sentences.chinese: 您可以修改本文所示的代码以仅支持按键事件。

sentences.english: In High Profile, use your Armed button to unsheathe your sword.
sentences.chinese: 在高姿态时，用你的“武装”按键即可拔出你的剑。

sentences.english: The invention also openly adopts the television with the non engine inducing key-press.
sentences.chinese: 本发明还公开采用该非机械式感应按键的电视机。

sentences.english: The keypress has convenient installation and high reliability.
sentences.chinese: 该按键安装方便且可靠性高。

sentences.english: An infrared camera could record which keys you pressed.
sentences.chinese: 红外摄像头可以记录下你所敲击的按键。

sentences.english: If you did it in the lab or on your computer screen, you would do it by pushing buttons.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在实验室做，或者在电脑上做，你需要按键。

sentences.english: The invention also provides an electronic device using the keypress.
sentences.chinese: 本发明还提供一种使用该按键的电子装置。

sentences.english: When the call ended MP3 needs to replay by key-press.
sentences.chinese: 当蓝牙通话结束后，MP3需重新按键播放。

sentences.english: Of course, the tuner did not change the force required to depress the keys.
sentences.chinese: 调律师当然不会去改变按键所需要的力量。

sentences.english: Finally — and I’ve never seen this before — the letter keys are all lowercase.
sentences.chinese: 最后，让我吃惊的是，所有的按键都是小写字母。

sentences.english: The pressed key is optionally displayed in the console window.
sentences.chinese: 按下的按键会显示在主控台视窗中。

sentences.english: The package wizard is effectively sending keystrokes to a buffer with the intend of performing edits.
sentences.chinese: 为了执行编辑，包向导不断地发送按键到缓冲区。

sentences.english: My suggestion to you is to just push the button now and sort it out during stasis.
sentences.chinese: 我提议你，现在按下按键，在障碍时期做打叠整顿。

sentences.english: There's also a power button, shutter release, and zoom slider up top -- all pretty standard stuff.
sentences.chinese: 顶部上有一个电源按键，快门按键，镜头远近调焦键。

sentences.english: There's also a power button, shutter release, and zoom slider up top -- all pretty standard stuff.
sentences.chinese: 顶部上有一个电源按键，快门按键，镜头远近调焦键。

sentences.english: The key strokes to split inputted string.
sentences.chinese: 用来对所输入字串断句的按键。

definition: key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin
